__e: You remember you-you come to that... that meeting before to set the pest tent up and the like?
You're a pest. And I'd like it if you never put your snout in my door again.
Look, all I know is the guy was a pest... and he took all my change for the pay phone.
"fighting a pestilence that has no cure", well... we must each find our own answer.
All because one little prick had to go and write a book, Leopold Stotch.
As much as an annoying and otherwise rodent-like pest you've become in my daughter's life...
And now comes the Great Mortality, which truly is a sign that God is not happy.
You think they had a name for the Black Plague when one guy had it?
Four years ago, your son came very close to dying from pneumonic plague.
